meanings.definition: Constituting number seven in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The seventh day of the week is Sunday.
meanings.sent2: She sat in the seventh row at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The seventh cookie in the jar always magically disappears.
meanings.sent4: His seventh sense told him something was wrong.
meanings.sent5: The seventh star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: She ate a seventh of the pizza all by herself.
meanings.sent2: The team won by a seventh of a second.
meanings.sent3: The cat always naps in the seventh corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt heavy, like a missing seventh of a puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The seventh piece of the puzzle completed the picture perfectly.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number of seven in counting order.
meanings.sent1: Today is the seventh day of the month.
meanings.sent2: He was born on the seventh of July.
meanings.sent3: The seventh student in line always wears a hat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like the seventh bell in a tower.
meanings.sent5: The seventh wave crashed against the shore with a mighty roar.
